vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
Proxy.app_exec_id (Proxy.sol#31) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkErrors (Proxy.sol#58-78)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Proxy.getSelector (Proxy.sol#81-88) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: locked-ether
vulnerability_findings.message:
Contract locking ether found in Proxy.sol:
	Contract Proxy has payable functions:
	 - fallback (Proxy.sol#41-43)
	 - exec (Proxy.sol#55)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
Proxy.checkErrors uses assembly (Proxy.sol#58-78)
	- Proxy.sol#62-74

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
Proxy.getSelector uses assembly (Proxy.sol#81-88)
	- Proxy.sol#82-88

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Proxy.app_exec_id should be constant (Proxy.sol#31)
Proxy.app_index should be constant (Proxy.sol#32)
Proxy.app_version should be constant (Proxy.sol#30)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Proxy.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (Proxy.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (Proxy.sol#18): it allows old versions
